properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
URUGUAY.
DNC 01, DNC 07.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
   BY M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   37-32.50S 047-23.50W, 37-58.78S 047-02.88W,
   38-49.32S 047-50.03W, 39-40.20S 049-00.60W,
   39-58.88S 050-06.32W, 38-55.47S 051-11.42W,
   38-29.83S 050-54.07W, 37-59.97S 049-16.42W,
   36-49.18S 048-34.13W.
   TEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3152/14(24).
